sect1.title: Servers-fhttpd
sect1.para: To build PHP as an fhttpd module, answer "yes" to "Build as an fhttpd module?" to the --with-fhttpd=[DIR] configure option and specify the fhttpd source base directory. The default directory is /usr/local/src/fhttpd. If you are running fhttpd, building PHP as a module will give better performance, more control and remote execution capability.

note.simpara: Support for fhttpd is no longer available as of PHP 4.3.0.
